Some of the most fun I've had.  It was a solid narrative mixed with the signature dark humor of Valve's series.  Just buy it.  

Seriously.

Buy it.

Things I Liked

- Carries on from Portal in both story and gameplay
- Great sense of humour that actually made me laugh out loud
- Bouncy gel, platforms and the floating tractor beams added variation towards the end
- Longer than Portal 1, felt more of a complete game

Things I Didn't Like

- Levels that weren't set in the facility (I much preferred the clinical white wall look)
- The difficulty level ramped up dramatically for me around chapter 5 or 6 

Excellent game with unique puzzle gameplay and crisp graphics. 9/10
single player 8/10. co-op 10/10
Loved every inch of this game.  It was funny with engaging puzzles and great atmosphere.  Great game to pick up and consume over a weekend.
cooles spiel echt ephelenswert
Hervorragendes Spiel, ganz ohne Bugs, lustig geschrieben, und gut für den Kopf.
This game is awesome! It makes you think, it is funny and is as great in solo and multiplayer mode!!
SIN PALABRAS DE LA PUTA EPICIDAD DEL FINAL

Une digne suite de Portal avec une histoire beaucoup plus poussée que sa bêta (sarcasme)

LES +++

* Un scénario palpitant avec des rebondissements
* Une durée de vie très acceptable
* L'utilisation du Portal Gun optimisée au max'
* Des personnages haut en couleur
* De l'humour
* Un mode multijoueur et coop agrandissant la durée de vie
* Les nouvelles possiblitées avec le gel
* Un workshop disponible pour une durée de vie à l'infini
* Difficulté parfaite selon la progression de l'histoire

LES ---

* On aimerait être un peu plus bousculé par moment...
* Certaines phases de puzzle pas toujours justifiées

Bref, achetez-le (avec Portal 1 bien sûr)
You're gonna shoot a portal to the moon. No joke.

After 30 seconds into the game I was like: 'This is going to be one hell of a game!'
I beat it and it was one of the best investments of a couple Euros I've made in a long time.
Absolutely fantastic storyline, but that's not the best part. The best part were those little things that just make your day brighter and make the game shine upon others. 10/10 loved it!
Very entertaining. The storyline is great, even though I didn't get it completely. Puzzle solving feels so compensating, it's what kept me moving forward. Very good game, buy it.
此款游戏值得一玩
期待能不能有第三部神作出来咯，非常好玩的解谜游戏！
Very good game for the one that likes tricky challenges and can think logical, also a fun story in single player.
It`s very good game!
An amazing puzzle game that adds a new twist to puzzle games. Very good story and anyone who's looking for a game should look no further!

Portal 2 - a sequel to Portal, has everything that the first game lacked. The game is at least three times longer and is indeed harder than the original one.
New mechanics, new music, much deeper story - oh god I love this game. No words can describe my satisfaction after solving a puzzle I spent some time with just standing still and thinking.
If you played the first Portal, Portal 2 is a game you MUST play. If you haven't, [u]make sure to play the first part since the Portal 2 story contains many spoilers to Portal.[/u]
Oh, did I mention you can now create your own levels and share them through Steam Workshop? Infinite fun!
[b]10/10[/b]. Buy it, play it NOW.

Really enjoy this game, would definitely recommend to other people even though it's already a few years old will still live up to expectations. Thought I wouldn't like solo-play as I prefer multiplayer and co-op but enjoying that too so far~

Alright, I've been thinking. When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade! Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons; what am I supposed to do with these? Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down... with the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
Игра очень классная. Сюжет сначала немного скучноват, но вот потом ... Это огонь! Всем советую эту игру!
Just to counteract the idiots giving pointless negative reviews...

Well if you're ok with having your neighbors call the police or getting ur a$$ kicked out of the house for laughing so hard at 3 am, then i really recommend this game.
 It's the best coop game I've played in a while. The single player mode is awesome but coop is EPIC. There are many challenging levels in coop but you'll be having fun whether you fail, get trolled by your friend, or just commit a silly mistake that would just destroy you or your friend. 
It's really worth buying at full price but now it's your chance to grab it and save 80% :D

or Gladdos will yell somerhing at you.
or Cave will say an elegant line that has something to with winning $60\

十分优秀的游戏。相比于1作，有着更多的元素，更多的乐趣。总体难度比1代简单，有3D眩晕症的玩家慎入。

+++富有创意，相对简单的游戏设计
+++游戏难度体现在思维的视角转化而非思维深度
++创意工坊实验室功能
+剧情还不错
+价格便宜

-部分关卡需要在体积较大的地图中找到表面积较小的可开门的墙

9.5/10
